list.title: List
list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

export.title: Settings
export.exportDescription: You can export your recorded data in CSV or JSON format. Use it for backup or analysis with other tools.
export.importDescription: You can restore records from previously exported CSV or JSON files.
export.testDataDescription: You can generate sample data for testing purposes.
export.dangerZoneDescription: The following operations cannot be undone. Please be careful.
export.confirmDeleteAll:
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: All data (records and fields) will be completely deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete all data?
export.confirmDeleteAllFinal:
üö® Final Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

We recommend backing up your data.
export.confirmGenerateTestData:
üß™ Generate test data?

This will create about 100 random data entries for the past 30 days.
They will be added to your existing data.
export.deleteAllSuccess: ‚úÖ All data has been deleted and initial fields have been restored.
export.unsupportedFileFormat: ‚ùå Unsupported file format (only .csv or .json files are supported)

management.title: Settings
management.deleteWarning: Delete All Data: All record data will be permanently deleted.
management.deleteConfirmation:
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: All data (records and items) will be permanently deleted.

This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete all data?
management.deleteFinalConfirmation:
üö® Final Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

We recommend backing up your data before proceeding.
management.deleteSuccess: ‚úÖ All data has been deleted and initial items have been restored.

sort.title: Sort Items
sort.description: You can change the display order of items using drag & drop or keyboard. Drag the handle on the right or focus and press Space key to start sorting. You can also toggle the visibility of each item from the buttons.
sort.saveOrder: Save item order and display settings

validation.notesMaxLength: Notes must be {{max}} characters or less

aria.fieldNameDescription: Enter the name of the item you want to record
aria.dataTypeDescription: Select the type of data for this item
aria.unitFieldDescription: Enter the unit for this item (e.g. kg, mmHg)

errors.general: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again if you continue to experience issues.
errors.validation: There is an issue with the input. {{message}}
errors.database: A database error occurred. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.network: There is a network connection issue. Please check your internet connection.
errors.storage: Storage capacity is insufficient. Please delete unnecessary data and try again.
errors.rendering: A display error occurred. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.performance: The system response is slow. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.security: A security issue was detected. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.authentication: There is an authentication issue. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.permission: You do not have permission to perform this operation.

announcements.dialogOpened: Item sorting dialog opened. You can close it with the Escape key.
